verses.verse: The works of His hands are ((Rev. 15:3)) verity and justice; All His precepts are sure.
(Is. 40:8; Matt. 5:18) They stand fast forever and ever, And are ((Rev. 15:3)) done in truth and uprightness.
(Luke 1:68) He has sent redemption to His people; He has commanded His covenant forever: (Luke 1:49) Holy and awesome is His name.
(Job 28:28; (Prov. 1:7; 9:10); Eccl. 12:13) The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom; A good understanding have all those who do His commandments. His praise endures forever.
(The Blessed State of the Righteous) Praise the LORD! Blessed is the man who fears the LORD, Who (Ps. 128:1) delights greatly in His commandments.
((Ps. 102:28)) His descendants will be mighty on earth; The generation of the upright will be blessed.
(Prov. 3:16; 8:18; (Matt. 6:33)) Wealth and riches will be in his house, And his righteousness endures forever.
(Job 11:17; Ps. 97:11) Unto the upright there arises light in the darkness; He is gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.
(Ps. 37:26; (Luke 6:35)) A good man deals graciously and lends; He will guide his affairs ((Eph. 5:15; Col. 4:5)) with discretion.
